text: Outlaw is a shooting video game by Atari. It came out first for arcade automats in 1976. The player uses a joystick or a gamepad to play the game. It has animated violence in it. The player has to shoot targets to win points. == Other websites == *Outlaw overview at AllGame == Sources == Category:Arcade games Category:1970s video games
title: Outlaw (arcade game)
